title: Interactive Portfolio Website
description: This very website you're viewing! A modern, responsive portfolio built with React and TypeScript featuring animated banners, theme switching, and modular architecture.
features: Animated banner system with hover-to-pause functionality
Six custom color themes with real-time switching
Interactive skill cards with detailed experience information
Email integration for resume requests with reCAPTCHA security
Fully responsive design optimized for all devices

title: Butters On The Couch Project
description: An a quick little animation with Unity and C#, showcasing very much my introductory skills at in animation with Unity.
features: Butters sitting on the couch blinking and wagging his tail

title: KBO Animation with GIMP & Movie Maker
description: This short animation is a parody of the iconic HBO intro sequence, rebranded as KBO (Kitty Box Office). It includes custom TV static effects, a stylized title reveal, and a comedic timing cue with a meow to match the feline theme of my animated cat series.
features: Frame-by-frame digital artwork created in GIMP

title: Butters & Margie Animation with GIMP & OpenToonz
description: An ongoing animation project featuring both of my cats, Butters and Margie. Created using GIMP for artwork and OpenToonz for animation. The background landscapes and house interiors are complete, and Butters shows expressive facial animations while Margie maintains still.
features: Dual character animation featuring both cats
Detailed background landscapes and interior scenes
Hand-drawn digital artwork and frame animation
